channel.title: Renaming Npcs 718
channel.description: I currently have a 718 loading 742 rsps. It is a Rune-Evo Source. I am very new to 718/742 coding and I need help to rename a NPC. Can anyone tell me how to rename a npc To anything?

item.title: Renaming Npcs 718
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Then somewhere under that you should see[CODE]if (id == 549)
setRandomWalk(false);[/CODE]
under that, add this and change the 519 to whatever the npc id is.
[CODE]							 if(id == 519)
                                    setName("Skillcape salesman");[/CODE]

Then somewhere under that you should seeif (id == 549) setRandomWalk(false);
under that, add this and change the 519 to whatever the npc id is.

if(id == 519) setName("Skillcape salesman");

Read full topic
